key.name: panel-position
key.description: Sets the position of the extension on the panel. Possible values are: Left, Center, and Right.

key.name: panel-position-change
key.description: Allows the change of the numerical index position within the Left/Right/Center positions.

key.name: panel-position-index
key.description: Specifies the index position with positive values changing 'first from left' and negative values changing 'first from right' (best used with Right alignment). Possible values range from -999 to 999.

key.name: overview-mode
key.description: Allows overview to be opened when you mouse over the workspace bar.

key.name: wrap-around-mode
key.description: Wraps around from the last workspace to the first workspace when scrolling over the workspace bar.

key.name: empty-workspace-style
key.description: Enables the use of the empty workspace styling which is intended to indicate that no windows are active on a given workspace.

key.name: urgent-workspace-style
key.description: Enables the use of the urgent workspace styling which is intended to indicate that a window demands attention or has an urgent window hint.
